36/**
37 * \file
38 *
39 * This file contains functions for base EDNS options.
40 */
41
42#ifndef UTIL_EDNS_H
43#define UTIL_EDNS_H
44
45struct edns_data;
46struct config_file;
47struct comm_point;
48struct regional;
49
50/**
51 * Apply common EDNS options.
52 *
53 * @param edns_out: initialised edns information with outbound edns.
54 * @param edns_in: initialised edns information with received edns.
55 * @param cfg: configuration.
56 * @param c: comm channel.
57 * @param region: the region to allocate the edns options in.
58 */
59int apply_edns_options(struct edns_data* edns_out, struct edns_data* edns_in,
60 struct config_file* cfg, struct comm_point* c, struct regional* region);
61
62#endif
63
